message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $7500 for the product. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8500. What do you think?
